name: PRISON
description: Welcome to prison moon base Delta 4. You've been called in because of a rather out-of-control riot is taking place. And boy are the guards happy to see you! Well, maybe not, because they're a little trigger happy now that all carnage has broken loose. At least you know where to find ammo; right next to their dead corpses, where they've stock piled as much as they can to protect themselves.
